thread.title: Noelle Y
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Noelle Y

author: Noelle Y
title: Noelle Y
text: I've ordered a variety of different items from B&H. Always happy with the products and they have great service! They are knowledable and are patient with all questions. Love the Chat feature. It's nice to deal with someone directly, especially in this Amazon society we live in. They are the best!
